summary: Set in a world where love is deemed illegal and can be eradicated with a special procedure. With 95 days to go until her scheduled treatment, Lena Holoway does the unthinkable: she falls in love.
cast: Emma Roberts|Billy Campbell|Gregg Sulkin|Erin Cahill|Michael Michele|Melinda McGraw|Ian Anthony Dale|Jeanine Mason|Daren Kagasoff|Corey Reynolds|Delon de Metz|Melinda Cohen|Santiago Segura|Brenda Koo|Linc Hand|Link Baker|Jonathan Spencer|Lauren Neal|Jack Guzman|Tim Mikulecky|Jason Sims-Prewitt|Michelle Alvarado|Errol Sack|Mel McComb|Karen Constantine|Ryan Groves|Tilda Del Toro
keywords: based on young adult novel|failed pilot|unsold tv series pilot|tv pilot|based on novel
title: Delirium
